description: A short hike along a locally known-only trail to a 30ft straight drop waterfall onto the shore of the Bay of Fundy.  the trail enters the alders goes up hill a bit and then straight downhill.  There is a rope towards the shore where it get a bit steeper.  Right around the corner heading west is the major waterfall.  There is another ephemeral fall a bit further down the shore headng west as well by some large cliffs.
directions: Granville Rd to Victoria Beach and then park at the bridge at 44.702594, -65.747190.  The fall is in Mill Cove
title: Boudreau Brook Fall
